author: wn.com
title: As drought looms again, Australians are ready to embrace recycled water (UNSW - The University ...
text: ( Source : UNSW - The University of New South Wales ) A new survey shows Australians don't mind if the water coming from their tap is recycled, writes Stuart Khan . OPINION: Concerns about drought and water supply are once more building in
